ygData.msgSnippet: No you are not to under ANY circumatances have Mustex join your team. He wantes to negotiate with Veratis and that s it. When you leave Alliance island don t

 No you are not to under ANY circumatances have Mustex join your team.
He wantes to negotiate with Veratis and that's it. When you leave 
Alliance island don't forget he wouldn't leave his hover-cycle(Rhesus 
would charge him a fortune).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> you mean someone else is ready to accept the fact that my faction 
will rule
> the world and win this RPG? I'll welcome you aboard when you meet 
the
> others.
> 
> On the island of Spain the mutants searched frantically for a sigh 
pf thier
> lost collegues. Foxfingers stayed in beast mode sniffing around 
when he
> found a scent that he hadn't smelled since he snuck into the pack 
base. He
> opened his comm setting it to switch frequencies every 5 seconds so 
he
> couldn't be traced. "Hey guys, I think it's time to leave." He knew 
that the
> preds scent meant that she was here. Since Lunarpine had caught a 
scent and
> lost it heading in the same direction then there was only one 
option. That
> Silver Scout had found her donor.
> 
> Lunarpine and Razor Claw heard the message and moved towards tyhe 
rendevous
> point. Lunarpine knew her comm was inactive so he opened his 
thoughts. "Time
> to go Wing." he called knowing that her old name would catch her 
attention.
> 
> Ice had her comm off so she didn't get the message right away. "She 
caught
> Lunarpines thoughts and knew he was right. "Follow me. " she told 
mustex
> still hoping her trust in other bots wasn't getting her in more 
trouble.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Saturday, July 21, 2001 11:22 AM
> Subject: Re: Alliance
> 
> 
> > hey fix up the chars part of the site. cheetah is in the mutants 
even
> though i have him with the
> > x-preds
> > --- dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > >  WELL HOW'D THE MUTANTS GET THERE IN THE FIRST PLACE! Shileds 
aren't
> > > invincible you know. Remember when Black Aracnia helped 
Turantulas
> > > steal a stasis pod.
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > > > Feels good to finally have the time to make a nice long post 
:-)
> > > >
> > > > LegendaryNemasis, you might find Zardus's insight cheap in 
this
> > > post and future ones. However, there was a faction a long time 
ago in
> > > this RPG called the Energonians. They were energy beings much 
like
> > > yours, just they used energon energy instead of chaotican, and 
Zardus
> > > had a long rivalry with their leader (who happened to be one of 
the
> > > bots that helped Zardus and Wolfgang make the Alliance), so he 
knows
> > > how to handle energy beings.
> > > >
> > > > And the guy who controls Mustex: how'd Mustex get onto 
Alliance
> > > Island? The shields were up.
> > > >
> > > > ::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer/Mosquitor::
> > > >
> > > > Zardus frowns, thinking Frostbite's transmission over for a 
second
> > > and then replying. "I would preffer meeting in neutral 
territory.
> > > Would the peninsula near my base be convenient for you?"
> > > >
> > > > He closes that link, and recieves Orchestra's transmission. 
"This
> > > is Zardus, Alliance commander. I'll lower the shields so that 
you can
> > > get through. I'll be outside, we can meet there."
> > > >
> > > > He walks toward the exit, looking at his wrist comp and 
tapping a
> > > few buttons, making a search for "Infecticons". The search 
yields no
> > > matches. Zardus traces the Infecticon transmissions back to 
their
> > > origin, then makes a search for any bots that the Iron Fist's
> > > scanners detected traveling in that direction.
> > > >
> > > > "Interesting..." he says to himself, watching video footage of
> > > Vampiza flying over Alliance Island, surrounded by Chaotican 
energy.
> > > He zooms in, looking the bot over.
> > > >
> > > > Uncanny resembalance to Energonians, he thinks to himself,
> > > activating his comm to Daemos: "Daemos, can you report to my 
position
> > > as soon as possible? I need you to accompany me somewhere."
> > > >
> > > > Zardus ends that transmission as well, exiting the base and 
seeing
> > > a bot firing. He frowns, tapping a few buttons to turn the 
autoguns
> > > off, and begin lowering the shields.
> > > >
> > > > "You're either very brave or very stupid," he says, 
approaching the
> > > shields on the other side of which was Chaostaur (whatever his 
name
> > > is). "Attacking a military installation single-handedly is a 
very
> > > suicidal task."
> > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > FZ nods, looking over the beasts once more.
> > > >
> > > > "Yes. I must admit I wasn't expecting you to accomplish this."
> > > >
> > > > He turns and walks toward the exit, the door opening. "Would 
you
> > > like a shuttle to get back to wherever you are from, or would 
you
> > > rather fly by yourself?"
> > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > DevilDuer waits for Coput to get into the pilot seat, so that 
they
> > > can get going and he can get away from these weirdos. :-)
> > > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > Mosquitor is hit by Hurricane's shots (post 38120. Sorry for 
taking
> > > so long to reply), stumbling a bit.
> > > >
> > > > "Traitor! Hell Beast will have your head!" he yells and 
lunges at
> > > Hurricane again, swinging a large insect leg at him.
> > >
> > >
